# flags

**Instance Property**

The dispatch queue work item flags.

## Declaration

```swift
var flags: DispatchWorkItemFlags
```

## Inspecting Scheduler Options

- **qos**: The dispatch queue quality of service.
- **group**: The dispatch group, if any, to use when performing actions.
